Question: Why would you take a bus to work?
Options: A. commute B. flying C. get somewhere D. travel E. go home

A. commute
B. go to the store
C. go to the movies
D. go to the park

A. Commuting to work is a common reason to take a bus. It is a convenient and cost-effective way to travel to your workplace.
B. Going to the store is not a reason to take a bus to work. It is a separate activity that you might do after work or on the weekend.
C. Going to the movies is not a reason to take a bus to work. It is a leisure activity that you might do on the weekend or in the evening.
D. Going to the park is not a reason to take a bus to work. It is a recreational activity that you might do on the weekend or after work.

Therefore, the final answer is: A.
